name: filebrowser-enhanced
description: Overlays Firefox's built-in desktop browser with additional functionality
author: Brett Zamir

preferences.name: conserveSpace
preferences.title: Apply space-conserving styles
preferences.description: Apply styles which hide unused space, borders, etc. at the top of Firefox's file directory indexes

preferences.name: revealLaunchNoPrompt
preferences.title: Reveal or Launch without prompts
preferences.description: Allow reveal and launches without confirmatory prompts
